I just bought a new Microsoft optical trackball so it'll be a while 
before I play gladiator.  It took me about 3 weeks to get used to a 
normal trackball so go figure about this one.

'Halflings' is the best name I could come up with.  Other names could 
be "half-breeds" and "nature's mistakes" [somehow, I doubt those two 
names would be popular].  'Halfings', also, in the universe of 
Gargoyles the tv show, refers to people who are half fey and half 
human.

Unless we want to start creating new words, I suggest we stick to 
'halfings'.  But if you are taking about 1 specific set of halfings: 
half-archmage and half-cleric, just refer to them as half-clerics and 
half archmages.
